animal.question: I say 'Meow' and like to drink milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink from a bowl.
🧶 I like to play with yarn.

animal.question: I wag my tail and bark. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🏡 I am a good friend to humans.

animal.question: I quack and swim in a pond. What am I?
I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🚿 I use my trunk to spray water.

animal.question: I hop and have long ears. What am I?
I say 'Moo' and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I am big and black and white.
🌾 I eat grass in a field.

animal.question: I roar and I am the king of the jungle. What am I?
I have black and white stripes. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I eat grass on the plains of Africa.

animal.question: I swing from trees and love bananas. What am I?

hints.text: 🍌 I like to eat yellow fruit.

animal.question: I slither on the ground and have no legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I can be long or short.
🌿 I might live in the grass or trees.

bug.question: I have six legs and like to crawl. I'm small and sometimes fly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 Some of my friends live in the ground.

bug.question: I hop around and I'm green. I have strong legs for jumping high. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to live in grassy places.
🐸 I am not a frog, but I can jump far!

bug.question: I fly around with colorful wings. I drink nectar from flowers. What am I?
I make honey and live in a hive. I have a stinger, so be careful! What am I?

hints.text: 🍯 My honey is sweet and yummy.
⚠️ I buzz around with my friends.

bug.question: I glow in the dark at night. I light up the garden. What am I?

hints.text: 🌃 You see me best when it's dark.
✨ I am a small insect that flashes.

bug.question: I march in lines and build big hills. I carry food back to my home. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am very small, but very strong.
💪 I can lift things much bigger than me.

bug.question: I have a hard shell and can be many colors. Some people think I'm lucky. What am I?

hints.text: 🪴 Gardeners like me because I eat other bugs.

bug.question: I am a beetle that rolls dung into a ball. I'm quite strong for my size. What am I?

hints.text: 🌍 I can be found in Africa, among other places.

bug.question: I can walk on water and have long legs. I eat other bugs that fall into the water. What am I?

hints.text: 💦 I stay on the surface of the water.
⛸️ It looks like I'm skating on the water.
🐛 I'm a predator of small bugs.

bug.question: I blend in with twigs and leaves. You might not even notice I'm there. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I look just like a part of a tree.
🍃 My body is long and thin.
👀 I am a master of disguise.
